description: There are plenty of backpacks out there, so how do you know which to pick? Well, our Backpack has the look and the durability, as well as the room to hold your stuff. But there's also a battery inside with enough juice to charge your Smartphone twice. Charging your iPhone, iPad, or iPod Touch has never been easier.
title: Powerbag Back Pack with Battery for Charging Smartphones, Tablets and eReaders, Black (RFAP-0123F)
